keys: grúa de la yarda del desecho

          <title>
            <string language="en">Application of an electromagnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anwendung eines Elektromagneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Application d'un électro-aimant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aplicação de um eletroímã</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Applicazione di un elettromagnete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφαρμογή ενός ηλεκτρομαγνήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aplicación de un electroimán</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a scrap yard crane that uses an electromagnet to lift scrap cars.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnet application</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scrap yard crane</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Schrottyardkran, der 
ein Elektromagneten benutzt, um Schrottautos anzuheben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une grue de yard de 
chute qui utilise un électro-aimant pour soulever des voitures de 
chute.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um guindaste da jarda da 
sucata que use um eletroímã levantar carros da sucata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una gru dell'iarda 
dello scarto che utilizza un elettromagnete per alzare gli automobili 
dello scarto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γερανό ναυπηγείων 
απορρίματος που χρησιμοποιεί έναν ηλεκτρομαγνήτη για να ανυψώσει 
τα αυτοκίνητα απορρίματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una grúa de la yarda 
del desecho que utilice un electroimán para levantar los coches del 
desecho.</string>
          </description>
